Texts.Chs: 把^orange;裂变反应堆^reset;带给这名科学家。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Fission Reactor^reset; to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 太棒了！作为感谢：拿着这个^green;合同^reset;，它能让你雇佣一个特殊的船员！还有这个^green;科技^reset;也给你。
Texts.Eng: Great! As thanks: This ^green;contract^reset; will allow you to recruit a unique hired crewmember! Oh, and this ^green;tech^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 你能在实验室用^orange;裂变反应堆^reset;产出大量电力。证明你能在^orange;能源设备制造器^reset;中制造出来，这份^green;船员合同^reset;就是你的了。我的飞船已经满员了。
Texts.Eng: You can generate a lot of power with a ^orange;Fission Reactor^reset; in your lab. Show you can make one using your ^orange;Power Station^reset; and you can have this ^green;crew contract^reset;. I don't have room for crew on my ship anyhow.
